mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(P1.GROUP_ID, P1.CATEGORY_ID) AS CATEGORY_KEY, CASE P1.CATEGORY_PARENT_LV WHEN 0 THEN P1.CATEGORY_DETAIL_NAME WHEN 1 THEN CONCAT(P2.CATEGORY_DETAIL_NAME, ' > ', P1.CATEGORY_DETAIL_NAME) END as CATEGORY_NAV, P1.CATEGORY_API_CODE FROM AREA_CATEGORY_TB as P1 LEFT OUTER JOIN AREA_CATEGORY_TB as P2 ON P1.CATEGORY_PARENT_LV = P2.CATEGORY_LV AND P1.CATEGORY_DETAIL_PARENT_LV = P2.CATEGORY_DETAIL_OR AND P1.GROUP_ID = P2.GROUP_ID
select category_api_code FROM AREA_CATEGORY_TB where group_id=#{groupId} AND category_lv = 1
